member.returns: A boolean value. True indicates the category is accepted.

member.name: M:Ximura.Server.ApplicationService.RegisterContainer(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: This method is used to register the containers for the inherited classes that wish to participate is the Ximura messaging infrastructure.

member.name: P:Ximura.Server.ApplicationService.ServiceComponents
member.summary: This is the list containing the service components. This list will be only be populated after ConnectComponents has been called.
